page.title: 17SCHOOLS
page.content: {KNIGHTS ENHAM INFANTS SCHOOL. Knights Enham Infants School was opened in 1972.They have got 6 permenant and 2 temporary classes. Knights Enham Infants school has got 141 children in the school and 53 in the nursery.There are 6 teachers in the school.There are 11 other people working there.There school is a modern building. They have got 2 sandpits and an aqua-lab. {KNIGHTS ENHAM JUNIOR SCHOOL The school is 15 years old.There are 8 classrooms,2 playgrounds,6 teachers , about 180 children at the moment.The school building is very modern.The main aim of the school is to ensure that each child achieves the very best of which they are capable.
